question: Who among the following is the ex-officio chairman of Indian Council of World Affairs ?
explanation: The Indian Council of World Affairs is a New Delhi based Indian think-tank. Established in 1943, it is devoted exclusively for the study of international relations and foreign affairs. By an Act of Parliament, it has been declared an institution of national importance in 2001. The Vice-President of India is ex-officio Chairman of the Indian Council of World Affairs.
